column4: ANYONE?  i tried both alsa and pulse.. but same problem is audible from both exile and spotify. i can hear the music but it sounds like it is compressed to 1bit. the sound was ok until recently.. i have not played music for a couple of days but dicovered the problem today. HEEEELP!!!
Can you give us a second to respond?
Go into the preferences window for volume control and check the sliders that you want
